content: विवर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Colourless, pale, wan, pallid; नरेंद्रमार्गट्ट इव प्रपेदे विवर्णभावं स स भूमिपालः <ls>R. 6. 67.</ls> {@--2@} Discoloured, deprived of water (as a gem.); विवर्णमणीकृतं (कनकवलयं) <ls>Ś. 3. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Low, vile. {@--4@} Ignorant, stupid, unlettered. --र्णः An outcast, a man belonging to low caste.
